title: GET DISCOUNT EVERY MONDAY
description: Ignite every Monday with a 25% discount at Hipokampus! Elevate your energy and skyrocket your productivity. Make it the best start of every week! Discount Code: TURUNCUPAZARTESİ

title: AUTUMN SALE
description: Embrace the fresh energy of autumn with the Orange Season Discount! Use code: turuncu sezon for 20% off. Enjoy coworking in our open garden or indoor spaces, complemented by high-speed fiber internet.

title: DISCOUNT TO MEET
description: Enjoy a special 25% discount on your first day at Hipokampus! Discover the advantages with high-speed internet, open or indoor spaces, and 24/7 offices. Discount Code: TANIŞMAYAGELDİM

title: SPECIAL DISCOUNT FOR LAWYERS
description: Located precisely halfway between the courthouse and the enforcement office, both just 300 meters away, become a prestigious lawyer with our fully-equipped office services and secretarial support!
